    <div class="lg-8 md-12 sm-12 article-content-wrapper">
        <header>
            
    
    <h1 class="A-TYP48T-RW-ALL article-title">精明型的流動理財日與夜</h1>

            <div class="second-line-article-component clearfix">
                
                <div class="article-publish-date">
                    
    <span class="A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"></span>
    

                </div>
            </div>
        </header>
        <div class="article-introduction">
            <p class="A-PAR22R-RW-ALL ">
                
            </p>
        </div>
        <div class="article-content">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    
    
    <div>
        <blockquote class="A-BLQ22LI-RW-ALL" id="article_content_quote_1">
            <span class="icon icon-quote-open" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            理財精明的您，生活總離不開多張信用卡。網上購物、繳交賬單、飲食消閒、Staycation（住宿度假）及海外簽賬，近乎每個項目都會使用特定的信用卡，務求賺盡優惠及享受消費獎賞。然而，每到繳交卡數的時候，便覺得煩亂。所以，香港滙豐流動理財應用程式（HSBC HK App）以單一平台，為您解決多種賬單繳費問題。
            <span class="icon icon-quote-close" aria-hidden="true"></span>
        </blockquote>
    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-IMG-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    <div id="article_content_image_1" class="smart-image">
        
            
            <figure class="smart-image-figure">
                
    
    
    <picture id="article_content_image_2">
        
        
        
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-her-smartphone-pwsimg-1958.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-her-smartphone-pwsimg-1958.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 960px)">

<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_1">
    9:00：一次登入，交齊所有卡數
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_1" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">常用的信用卡也有四、五張！牢記不同的繳款到期日、登入不同網頁繳交卡數，與其費時失事，不如用HSBC HK App，繳交所有信用卡結欠。啟用流動保安編碼及推播通知<sup><a href="#1"><span aria-hidden="true">1</span><span class="visuallyhidden">1 參考註腳 1</span></a></sup>後，即時收到最新滙豐信用卡結單通知，精明理財，變得輕鬆簡單。<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-IMG-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_2">
    15:00：在家以信用卡繳交家居雜費
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">突然想起保單年費今日到期？立即透過HSBC HK App 以滙豐信用卡繳費<sup><a href="#2"><span aria-hidden="true">2</span><span class="visuallyhidden">2 參考註腳 2</span></a></sup>，避免遲交而罰款，再順手用「轉數快」更可掃二維碼即時繳交水、電、煤等家居雜費， 毋須輸入戶口號碼或繳費金額，省時省力。<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-IMG-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-mobile-phone-pwsimg-1958.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-mobile-phone-pwsimg-1958.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 960px)">
        <source srcset="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-mobile-phone-pwsimg-1958.jpg/jcr:content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1220.1000.jpeg 1x, /content/dam/hsbc/hk/images/mass/way-to-bank/tile-16-9/woman-using-mobile-phone-pwsimg-1958.jpg 2x" media="(min-width: 480px)">

<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="article_content_heading_3">
    23:00： 自行簡單封鎖失卡
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="article_content_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">深夜在家網上購物，付款時發現找不到滙豐信用卡，立即使用HSBC HK App暫時封鎖；假若尋回也可即時輕鬆解鎖，過程快捷簡單。<br> </p>
</div></div>

 <li><a id="2"></a>請於「商戶與機構名單」參閲接受信用卡繳費的機構。繳稅及向保險公司繳交為償還保險公司保單貸款賬單類別的費用不能賺取「獎賞錢」，詳情請參閱「『獎賞錢』計劃條款及細則」。<br> </li> 
</ol>
